title: can wait for camille to be played everywhere but top
body:
some dumbasses in bronze most likely will  try her in bot lane in the first hour and then another dumbass will think she can mid.

I give her 3 hours before we see posts about her being played in bot or mid for sure

replies.body: With all the walls the jungle has, I'm sure jungling wouldn't be much of an issue. Bot lane being an issue? Sure. Mid being an issue? With the lack of useable walls, I'd say that's an actual issue.
i still wouldnt like to see her bot, considering ivern is a tricky jungler, and i pick up champions pretty easily, in bronze itll just be everyone tilting the adc or sup for picking it

Oh, I apologize if I didn't make it clear enough, but I was agreeing with you on the 'bot lane' portion of your post. I don't want to see her there, either. Unless, of course, it's norms and people are queuing with a full group of friends and simply having fun 'doing stuff'. My friends and I used to do that all the time. Queue as 5 in norms and do random stuff, like Melee bot, ranged (non adc) junglers and Mage top. It was fun because of the random factor combined with friends.

But, yeah, in an actual game of 'I want to win and that's my focus', then yes, Camille should not be going bot lane.
Like any fun laner, especially top, she will be nerfed until she can only jungle.
She can jungle though. She can jungle very well.
as i was writing this i was thinking how cant she jungle there are walls everywhere but i havent looked at her game play that much, i just know shes gonna op when comes out
mid doesn't have enough WALL to make good use of her dash, but jg Camille is apparently fairly viable.
